title: sub_total_item
name: sub_total_item
description: A sub-total item shows a sum of the previous line items, e.g. to distinguish hardware and service costs on a document.

position.description: Required since items are sorted by position.

name.description: Title of the sub-total e.g. Hardware total

type.description: The item type: SubTotalItem. Must be set when creating new items via document.items array

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

_destroy.description: When set an existing item will be deleted. This switch is used for items passed-in nested inside their parent object(a document), which is default as long as there is no line item endpoint available.
